titles.title: Cutting Copays Act
Cutting Copays Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for adjustments to the Medicare part D cost-sharing reductions for low-income individuals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Cutting Copays Act
This bill eliminates cost-sharing for generic drugs for those with the lowest-income under the Medicare prescription drug benefit's Low-Income Subsidy Program beginning in 2026.
